name: y-scanner
description: Simple, but powerful lexical scanner that is a more minimal implementation of X-Scanner

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run qtest
scripts.pretty:all: npm run pretty:src && npm run pretty:test
scripts.compile: npm run lint:all && npm run build && npm run minify-all
scripts.update-patch: npm run compile && npm version --no-git-tag patch
scripts.update-prepatch: npm run compile && npm version --no-git-tag prepatch
scripts.update-minor: npm run compile && npm version --no-git-tag minor
scripts.update-preminor: npm run compile && npm version --no-git-tag preminor
scripts.update-major: npm run compile && npm version --no-git-tag major
scripts.update-premajor: npm run compile && npm version --no-git-tag premajor

author: Chupacabral
